credentials: PHD 1990 Univ of IL at Urbana-Champaign
name: DANIEL KLINGENBERG

ratings.comment: Prof Klingenberg was amazing at explaining concepts. Lecture was "online" (we watched lecture recordings from 2017 I think) but they are well done and he comes to discussion. He attempts to get to know his students and interact during discussion, so you can tell he really cares! HW sets take a long time but he was very helpful in office hours.

This wasn't a difficult course and Professor Klingenberg was fun. However, the difficulty of exams and quizzes was downplayed. We also were not given much help preparing for exams. This class was also only one credit and I felt that at times we were doing more than one credit worth of work. I would definitely recommend Professor Klingenberg.

Prof. Klingenberg has been one of the best engineering professors I've had at UW. The homework sets can get pretty brutal, so I suggest working with a group of people every week to tackle them together, but exams were always fair and straightforward. Only complaint is that it took 2+ weeks to get exam scores back. Great class, great professor.

Professor Klingenberg is the GOAT. His class is one of the hardest I have ever taken but that is because the material is hard, not because he is a bad teacher. He is a fantastic teacher and it was my genuine honor to have been educated by this man. 100 percent recommend. You will be a better person for taking this class.
Great professor for the class. Discussion is mandatory but he attends every section and makes sure you understand the material. Office hours were very helpful as well.
Prof. Klingenberg is one of the best professors at UW. He actually cares, and even shows up to every discussion section to help students understand the material.

DJK is probably the best prof I've ever had. The structure of this class is great: it's clear what the exams will be like every time, he gives multiple practice exams, the hw reflects (mostly) what exams are like, he really wants you to learn and do well, plus he is super nice and funny. Overall 10/10 would recommend. Made a hard class a lot easier

CBE 320 could easily be a very confusing class, but he does an excellent job of explaining concepts in the lectures and in discussion. You can tell he cares about the students and he wants you to succeed. Also attend his office hours! I would take a class again with him if I were given the opportunity.

Professor Klingenberg made an extremely difficult class into one of the best classes I've ever taken in my life. The expectations are clear, the concepts are explained well, and he came to every discussion to help us work through our practice problems. I would highly recommend. I don't think I've ever learned more in a single class before.

Excellent professor. CBE 320 is hard, but he is very willing to answer any questions in class, discussion or office hours. Exams are tough but fair, and he gives plenty of practice/preparation. Lots of homework though.
Had him for half of the semester. Very clear grading criteria and helped all that he could to make sure that students got the best grades they possibly good. Very approachable.

Best CBE professor ever!! explains everything in a neat and comprehensible way, his homework is always on what he presents in lecture. And his exams are a notch above the difficulty of his homework, same concepts though. Has a fun personality, very easy to talk to

Class had 3 online lectures, 1 required two hour in-person discussion, and 1 hour optional Q&A session with professor per week (plus office hours). Explains topics well, does lots of examples in lectures. Difficult, but in a good way, he expects a lot. Very knowledgeable about subject. Recommended.
Lots of assignments. Expects perfection. One of the best prof in UWM. Definitely recommend for ChE classes.

Crystal clear explanation of topics. Extremely helpful and student friendly. Knows everything related to the subject and otherwise. No one can explain transport phenomena better than him. Double thumbs up!
Best professor I've had so far!! Very approachable, excellent understanding of topic, tries to help at any opportunity, clear explanations of topics

Before starting the module w/ this professor, I was really excited about the topic, but the class was not as interesting as I thought it would be. He was ok for a professsor and tried makeing some jokes during class to make it less boring. He grades fairly but is very picky about works cited pages.

Klingenberg explains everything in a clear and concise way that everyone understands, thrown in with bits of dry humor during the dryest moments of class. He is friendly, patient, not stuck-up and very willing to help with any problems in the course. A definite recommendation for ChE classes.
